data.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
data.author: J.K Rowling
data.summray: A young boy discovers he is a wizard and attends a magical school, where he makes friends and enemies and uncovers a dark secret.

data.title: A Game of Thrones
data.author: George R. R. Martin
data.summray: Noble families vie for control of the Iron Throne as an ancient enemy rises in the north.

data.title: The Hobbit
data.author: J. R. R. Tolkien
data.summray: A hobbit embarks on a journey with a group of dwarves to reclaim their mountain home from a dragon.

data.title: Inception
data.summary: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

data.title: Schindler's List
data.summary: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

data.title: Pulp Fiction
data.summary: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster, and his wife intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
